Text.val: 28.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
03.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ, ADMN_CURRENCY, ADMN_ADMNO_RATES from :1/CLNT, :1/ADMN where CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGS > 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and not(exists(select * from :1/CDOV where CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CDOV_DATE = ':2'))
select max (CDOV_OVERDRAWINGAGREED) from :1/CDOV where CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and CDOV_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and CDOV_HANDLED_MQTY_ID = 180

select cast(sum(CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALFACTACC,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALRETENTIONACC,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALDISPUTESACC,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY,0) + ifnull(CDTO_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS,0) ) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CDTO where CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and CDTO_DATE = ':4'
